name: t11_mixed_stress
description: Combined stress test merging function pointers, static name collisions, recursion, loops, and string formatting into one project. The 'worst case' for both builder and oracle_dwarf.
oracle_pressure: Combines every stress category: indirect calls via plugin table, static name collisions in engine vs plugins, recursive tree walks, loop-heavy processing, and string-heavy reporting. Maximum cross-TU DWARF complexity.
